place_description: Calder the Hockey Pup, In-House Coffee Roasting, Home of CHAR-LATTE, Local Breakfast Burrito's, Fresh Cafe Pastries, Beer & Wine Lounge, Rooftop Patio, Healthy Lunch Wraps, Togo Salad Bowls, Daily Espresso Specials, Bike Friendly Coffee Shop.

reviews_data.review_text: shout out mason graham
My soccer coach works there
Great coffee and everyone who works there always has a positive attitude!
Coffee was bitter and had little flavor.
Coffee taste is good. People are also very nice

I nice place to get work done they have lots of room to sit and get on the computer, read or just relax. They having seating upstairs with a rooftop and outside. This place is trendy and cozy. I got the apricot lemonade and an empanada both delicious. This place is really nice.
Giddy Goat are fantastic. I love their empanadas and of course they make terrific coffee!
Always amazing quality and consistency. Friendly staff and great environment
Greta space to work, read or just hang out.
Pra quem gosta de um ambiente musica ambiente, tomar um cappucino, excelente cafe da manha em Charlotte North Caroline e empanadas e trabalhar com seu laptop recomendo muito.

Amazing coffee shop! The place was packed when we went, we're gonna go earlier next time but it was packed with good reason because the coffee and food was amazing! My husband got the coffee of the day and the goat burrito and I got an iced mocha with the shaka burrito, everything tasted delicious! The staff was very friendly and the atmosphere was great!

There is also plenty of outside seating which is very nice! Definitely recommend this place

It's an amazing local coffee roaster.
Very popular and can be a little cramped inside when it's busy, but the food and coffee are well worth the wait and price.
Always a great time at Giddy Goat Plaza Midwood!!
One of my all-time favorite coffee shops in Charlotte! Must visit cafe - great coffee, people, and vibes
The sweet corn and breakfast empenadas were delicious, as was the vegan banana bread. Can't go wrong with the empenadas or pastries and breads.
Always delicious coffee & snacks! I love the beautiful outdoor patio.

Rachel and the taller gentleman named Kyle(maybe, I apologize I forgot your name) who wore a hat and had great curly hair; I apologize for the lack of detail as my day was quite eventful. Nevertheless, the atmosphere of the space was exceptionally inviting, featuring a mezzanine and plenty of outdoor seating. Each individual I encountered greeted me warmly with a smile and displayed remarkable courtesy. Now, regarding the coffee of the day, it was a dark roast that was rich and effective in providing the necessary boost. This allowed me to complete my studies and reach my destination after regaining my composure from the earlier chaos.
Absolutely love the coffee and pastries here. Empanadas are the best. My favorite giddy goat quality is the atmosphere as their staff and cafe establish a hospitable environment.
This place is busy but for good reason! We had breakfast empanadas, coffee, and blueberry muffin and enjoyed it all! would absolutely return!
Empanadas are great!
Some of the best coffee around Charlotte and the vibes are cool too! We love getting coffee and pastries here. There is limited parking, which is the only downside.
Great spot in Plaza Midwood, with great quality coffee.

This has become my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte. I've tried nearly all of them, and this one takes the cake for me. I tend to be quite picky about coffee, as lots of cafes in the area often leave me disappointed, but not Giddy Goat. I've been here a few times now, and have had multiple different drinks, and they're all great. Recently, I had a Vietnamese cold brew here, and it quite literally is my favorite cup of coffee i've ever had. Super light and creamy, it had a similar experience to drinking a beer as it had a head and a base, it was phenomenal. I've also had a couple scones from here and they were great, I can't speak for the empanadas as I haven't tried them, but they look great. Overall, this place has all 5 stars for me. Great atmosphere, one of the best for coffee shops in the area, and the coffee is the best in my opinion. This is my go to for coffee, and you should try it too, you won't be disappointed.

Solid coffee but I like to go here for the great atmosphere  - it's a great place to hang out.

I highly recommend getting the app if you go there regularly. The app is well done and makes ordering a breeze as you avoid standing in line.

Prices are also very reasonable compared to most similar places.

The dulce de leche protein bars were delicious. I would buy 20 for the house. The empanadas were also very good with the chimichurri sauce. Friendly service and cute place with outdoor seating is a plus
Truly amazing place... Had a true espresso coffee after very long time, used to have such taste of milk froth in marriages of 80's/90's.

Visiting from Florida and made a stop for a quick bite. Order empanadas and cold coffee. One of the empanadas was under cook and the.coffee not good. I'm sorry the look of the store is nice and trendy but unfortunately the food is not
Passing through and needed a pick me up... Great food (empanada and pistachio croissant), fast and friendly service and the atmosphere was pretty diverse - inside, outside, work, chill
Great empanadas,  in particular, the breakfast ones.
Coffee is the best in Charlotte, empanadas are great!

Made a to-go order today, I used to love it but but now they're super stingy with their sauces, made me pay for it but I didn't get anything when I received my order! I also didn't specify (which I shouldn't) to make my latte less sweet and my coffee was waaaay too sweet I couldn't even drink it, just tasted like sugar. If you have good coffee maybe don't ruin it with tons of sugar? :)

If you're looking for a fantastic space for your event, look no further! I rented the upstairs space at Giddy Goat for my 40th birthday party, and could not have been happier. The food and drinks were amazing, and the entire team was so friendly and accommodating - they all helped me have the perfect party.
Love Giddy! Plus there are several Pokestops while sipping java.
Great coffee, vibe, and free sparkling water!

My favorite coffee shop in charlotte. I've never had a bad experience here. I usually get a matcha latte or chai latte since I'm not a coffee drinker. My friend, who is a coffee connoisseur, loves their flat whites!

The food is delicious, I've tried about half of the menu by now. The empanadas are popular.

The outdoor seating in front of the restaurant, upstairs, and the rooftop offer plenty of options to sit and enjoy the atmosphere.

I've been a patron of Giddy Goat for years and will continue to be even after I move away from Plaza Midwood!

They also host a bunch of community events throughout the month!
I enjoyed my beverage but the pastries were only okay
Amazing staff and drinks plus food is delicious

Beginning with minute croissants, dulce de leche croissant was delicious but didn't like the guava and goat cheese croissant. Banana nut bread was the winner. Cinnamon bread was tolerable. Mocha cold brew cake was hard and a big no. Yogurt parfait was surprisingly sour since the yogurt was not fresh.
Excelente el ambiente tanto para trabajar como para pasar un buen tiempo. El cafe y la comida son de gran calidad y gustosas.
The food was amazing staff are laid back super friendly and very helpful great atmosphere will definitely be back
My go-to coffee shop in Charlotte. Work from home and this is a great spot to get stuff done throughout the day. Great indoor/outdoor vibe with friendly staff. Check it out!
Overall the restaurant is just really dirty. It needs a good cleaning. Just feels gross. If the dining area looks like that, then how's the kitchen?
Great place. Exceptional service. Goat cheese croissants- are the Heaven.
Love yall
My new morning routine includes nitro tea!

Nice vibe inside but nothing stands out. I sipped my iced latte and threw it out after no amount of sweetener could salvage the bitter burnt taste of the coffee. I tried their banana bread and threw that out too due to its dryness and lack of flavor. The employees were very nice. Be warned about their super tight parking lot. I would only go back to sample their empanadas but you can find great empanadas up and down Central Avenue.
Super cute, nitro was excellent and service was perfect.
Love coming to giddy! Great iced chais and the empanadas are to die for. Plenty of room to sit with friends or just get some work done.
Love this place! Great staff, great energy, and great coffee!
Tasty food, great service & great community

Best coffee shop in Charlotte..my favorite chai latte. Empanadas are incredible. Get the weekend burritos if you get up early. Top notch baked goods..gotta get there early to get a seat but so worth it.
Great food, great coffee
Every visit is a treat, ensuring an amazing cafe experience.

This is absolutely my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte! Great cold brew (light, medium, and dark roast) and extraordinary breakfast items. The GOAT burrito on the weekends is amazing. The spinach and breakfast empanadas are some of my favorites as well!
No experience with your food but you all are very informative about the coffees I have had and seem to go the exra mile for me, love the atmosphere as well.
Best coffee shop in town
Best coffee in Charlotte!
Amazing vegan baked goods

Outstanding. Amazing coffee, great pastries, and the vibe was outstanding. A few people were in shop when I got there and I can see why!
The upstairs is super fun
Great coffee, wonderful atmosphere. The nitro cold brew was amazing!
Loved the atmosphere of this place! A great place to meet with friends or a quite place work. The burritos and empanadas were delicious!
The Best Cortado in town.
This place is the best of the best in Plaza Midwood. Great atmosphere, great coffee, and even better empanadas. I've been 10 times now since discovering it a few months back. Highly recommend!

Loved the atmosphere and setup! Such a great spot. The seasonal drink menu is amazing. I'd definitely recommend the matcha, protein iced coffees, and empanadas. The other baked treats looked delicious as well. :)
My favorite coffee shop in c

It's a perfect cafe to visit in any season or escape for a the remote work, as they have amazing indoor and outdoor spaces.
Their coffee grounds and their all day breakfast options are very much authentic. Their gluten free and vegan breads are to give a try.
I came here after riding past it and being curious lol. The empanadas are so doggone good!! And the customer service is pleasant as well. I will be back!
Everything about giddy goat is AWESOME!! Coffee is amazing. Empanadas are amazing. Burritos are FIRE. Staff is awesome. I come here all the time and always have a great experience

Best coffee in Charlotte.  The service, coffee (roasted in-house), self-serve water station, staff, food, atmosphere, location, everything.. it just fits.  Lucky to have this place around.  Just a simple black cup of coffee - its the best in the area.  Highly recommend.
Great place to get coffee, study, or/and hang out with friends and family. It can get busy  and parking is difficult but it is worth it!
Coffee tasted great! Rachael was super nice! Great service
Best coffee shop in town with good food and vibes
I love the atmosphere,  people, furniture and great coffee!
Great food and drink. Great atmosphere and friendly staff!
Nice spot for a coffee or a drink. Upstairs are has a nice ambiance and a small rooftop patio when the weather is nice
Magic coffee! And loved the empanadas and veggie burrito wrap.
Always a great experience at Giddy Goat! I love the veggie burrito and nitro tea!
Very friendly staff! Coffee and empanadas were delicious. Quick service to grab togo.

Absolutely love this place! Doesn't matter the time of day, it's the perfect spot. I've been there for coffee, the empanadas, drinks upstairs, they have it all. It's a great spot to bring some work or to just socialize and they are nestled right in the heart of Plaza Midwood. They also have great outdoor patio spaces!
Coffee delish. Recommend trying all empanadas. Burrito 9/10. Vanilla lavender latte . Great outside seating + free parking can't beat it.  We'll be back.

Super cute and vibey coffee shop! We went on the perfect day, it was 70 degrees and they have a huge garage door and large windows open. I got a lavender and rosemary latte (iced) and it was soooo good. I had my kids with me and we shared a few empanadas too. They were all really good and we enjoyed them. The shop had some cute merch and coffee beans too. Clean bathroom.  The only hard part is parking. Close parking is hard to find and so we went to  a paid lot and it was 10 dollars for 2 hours. A little spendy but the area is cute. We walked around a little bit up and down the street to get some more time in. All in all, I would highly recommend.
Had been visiting the area and decided to try this place. Love their outdoor seating bc we always having our dog with us. Great coffee and bakery.
Absolutely delicious empanadas and pastries
Empanadas are good! Pretty big coffee shop with two floors

Hands down the best coffee shop in Charlotte!

The food (empanadas, breakfast burritos) are very flavorful and well-made. The coffee options are also very good! Spacious with both indoor and outdoor seating. 10/10 would recommend!
Hipster coffee shop in Plaza Midwood. Lots of seating area. Great empanadas
An absolute YAS
Great place and great location. Vanilla latte was yummy and they recommended a chicken empanada which was also yummy. Will be back and definitely gonna think about this place to work from
This coffee show had an awesome atmosphere with lots of room and super cool upstairs!! Will be back regularly!!

The pastries are amazing.
House coffee is straight goodness.
Definitely try the empanadas
One of my favorite coffee shops in Charlotte. I come here on a weekly basis! Great coffee & cozy atmosphere
Favorite coffeeshop in Charlotte. Love their London Fog ... with Lavendar!
Love Giddy! It's cozy and yummy!

Super yummy empanadas and well-made dessert (tried the banana  bread  (vegan) and it just taste like any non-vegan one, good good ) and like that if you add flavors to your coffee/tea is middle so you can enjoy the great taste of your, in our case, matcha and decaf americano 

They count with cute merchandise and eco-friendly utensils 

Friendly staff and chill vibes~

Definitely coming back to tried more sweets and other empanadas flavors  (and maybe another matcha tho )
When you are in Charlotte, this is a must stop! Very chill vibe, great breakfast burrito and great coffee! This should be your morning  breakfast stop every day! :)

We fell in love with their hospitable costumer service! Super sweet and very accommodating. My husband accidentally spilled his drink and they graciously remade the drink! They also didn't let us clean our spill! Usually when that happens in other restaurants (or at least in our experience) it's an inconvenience for the employees to have to clean up accidental spills. On top of that the empanadas and the sauces were delicious!!! We will definitely come back!
Thank you Arien and Joe for such a nice experience!!
I love it here!  Too many folks taking up prime real-estate with computers. If you're  not drinking or eating, make room for new customers!

Wow! Why have I not been here before! Such a cute vibe! Head upstairs for some quiet time with a bar and great window views! Oh and the chicken Empanda is the real deal! Soooooo good! Def coming back!
Love it here !
Great coffee shop with great coffee and vibes. It can get loud in there but nonetheless it's still a great spot to meet up with friends or studying, just be sure to bring headphones.

It's a great location. Crazy busy every time I'm in there. I will say if you want espresso that will make you go go this is the place. I prefer a mellower latte but they have a very heavy handed espresso which is definitely something you have to be in the mood for. Very strong!
Their drip coffee is amazing! I had a dark roast.

I love this restaurant. They have some of the best breakfast burritos on the weekends. They have an upstairs, quiet second floor seating area that is very cozy. There's outdoor seating as well. It's nice and well staffed. They make wonderful coffee, even they're Americano black is always perfect.

The coffee was smooth. The service was friendly. The empanadas were generously filled. They were more pastry-like than what I think a traditional empanada is. I enjoyed seeing the owners yellow lab service dog milling about but I guess patrons can't bring there pets in. Nonetheless I was happy to grab a spot in the small parking lot where space is a premium. We were the only ones there not plugged into a computer.  Weather wasn't nice enough to sit outside. Table was very wobbly.
I love this place. Great coffee and a wonderful atmosphere.
The empanadas are exceptional as are the coffee! Baristas are great!!
Love the ambiance. We like their empanadas very much. The service is always quick and perfect
Enjoy this local neighborhood coffee roaster! And they have beer :)

Long line when we went, but it moved quickly. Small space indoors, so it felt a little cramped, but there is extra seating upstairs to help. We tried coffee, Chai, empanadas, and croissants. All incredibly delicious. There is lots of street parking around, but the area is popular, so don't expect to pull right in next to the front door.
Great service. Yummy breakfast items.
Great location and food. Lots of nitro options also which was a nice change from other people only having 1 roast
Super yummy chai! Love the atmosphere

Extremely well-to-do coffee shop & eatery!  Portions & Pricing are more than reasonable as far as Plaza-Midwood has come to be. If the roastery area is seemingly packed, don't leave until you've checked out their upstairs "Lounge Area" - complete with lounge/chair/bartop seating, fireplace, & additional space to enjoy your snack, drink, or a good book/WiFi connection!!  Service is swift & the staff friendly to deal with!!! 11/10 will recommend their coffee(/beans) to all my friends. D-LISH'yus.

I'm leaving this review based solely on a cappuccino and carmel latte ordered on a busy post holiday Friday - and I'm being generous in my rating.

They were both so bad - undrinkable. This was our first visit because we wanted to try something new and we got the drinks to go. We took our first sips a few miles down the road - otherwise I would of said something in person.

Just really horrible - super bitter. Please do better. I would return to try them a second time in hopes it was just them being being busy - but even busy you should strive to put out good coffee.

They did have a lot of good options that from the case looked good.
Love the goat
This eco-friendly spot has great coffee & empanadas. Staff is always friendly & efficient. 11/10 would recommend

Giddy Goat is a wonderful addition to the commonwealth. It is consistently slammed!

Cons: parking. The parking sucks. Since it's always busy here the parking lot is regularly full. Furthermore... the empanadas. The flavor is on point. I've tried every empanada and honestly I love them but sometimes I can't get past the raw dough in the middle and on the bottom. They need a minimum of another 5 minutes in the oven since they aren't fried. Check the bottoms! I would love to see the crust a more golden brown across the entire pastry and not just a few spots on the top.

Pros: coffee! Love that they roast their own coffee. It's delicious. The staff that serves it up is always polite, personable, and kind. The overall environment at giddy goat is amazing. A great sense of community. You can tell that people love coming here. The atmosphere is perfect for meet ups, business, college students, family. I also love that GG does coffee and workouts, yoga and coffee, and dance lessons. There's also live music almost every week and tons of local art for sale.

I come here regularly and will continue to do so. As soon as I see those empanadas not as raw.. the 5th star will come.

I wish y'all great business!

Review update 12/20/23

Asked for more color on the empanadas.. got more color on them. They are glorious! Rich golden brown and crispy outside. As always the flavor is on point.

The location and decor was fun. Seeing the coffee roasted was a nice touch. Parking is typical to city parking, so you take it with a grain of salt. The barista was super friendly. Drinks compared well to Starbucks.

This place is great. It was packed when I was there and the service was quick and friendly. I got a Nitro Cold Brew with a shot of Mocha. It was a smooth coffee. The atmosphere was really good and had a great vibe.

The Giddy Goat has great food and drink options and we come here all the time. But, today I had to leave an awesome review for them because they carry a dairy-free peppermint mocha! I haven't been able to find any other shop that does this. I can't recommend them highly enough!

The empanadas and GOAT burrito were fantastic. They have one free refill for ice coffees, and a yummy caramel protein flavor for coffee. There is extra seating upstairs with a bar and kitchen too! Many bakery options available and great service/atmosphere
I only went in this time to pick up a bag of coffee beans to grind at home. Experience here is always great!

Giddy Goat Coffee Roasters has mastered the art of creating exceptional lattes! The rich, velvety texture coupled with the perfect balance of flavors makes it an absolute delight. But what truly sets them apart is their impeccable service - always warm, attentive, and inviting. Every visit is a treat, ensuring an unforgettable coffee experience

I love this place! Very consistent on food/drinks and easy to order online and pickup! Usually on the weekends there is longer lines, which is why I always order ahead and it's always ready by the time I get there! Highly recommend, the empanadas are AMAZING!! The breakfast and chicken are our favorite, but their vegan options are also delicious! The atmosphere is very chill and inviting, and plenty of places to sit inside or outside!
Great service, great coffee and delicious food!
Love the ambiance and the vibe of this cafe, kind and friendly employees, and of course great coffee. Thanks Giddy Goat!

The food here (we tried the empanadas) is great, it comes in a lot of variety. The drinks are good. It's a little pricey. The only issue is how cramped this place gets. There are two floors and outdoor seating but it fills up quickly with people who stay to work, so it's difficult to visit. I'd still recommend trying to visit, since the food makes it worth it.
Good coffee

Pretty cool spot serving up empanadas, coffee, and more! I ordered a matcha latte, a patagonia empanada, and a spinach empanada. I've never had a matcha latte before, and I have now realized that it is not my cup of tea. It isn't that it was bad, but my taste buds would prefer a chai latte or another specialty coffee over this. However, the empanadas were phenomenal! The meat was super tender inside the patagonia empanada and the spinach empanada was packed with a tasty filling. They were both flakey and delicious. The chimichurri and red sauce both paired well with the empanadas too. There is indoor and outdoor seating, and they also have a small parking lot. If you strike out on the parking lot, there is additional street parking that isn't too hard to find in the area. I will definitely be back here again for empanadas in the future!
Wonderful place! Cozy and delicious food and coffee. Everyone was pleasant and made the experience wonderful.
This is our go-to spot in Charlotte! Great ambiance. Very good prices. Clean. wonderful area of the neighborhood. Highly recommend!

Place was cool, coffee was good. I felt a little embarrassed because I made the person taking my order wait a sec while I decided if I wanted oat milk or whole milk thinking they mix it. They were patient and then once ordered they told me the creamers were behind me!
Great food and drinks! Love the atmosphere too. Their empanadas and sweet treats are great!
I love the coffee, food and ambience. Favorite coffee spot in Charlotte!
Great customer service and iced mocha latte with oatmilk

Very popular coffee shop. Went late morning on a Sunday and the place was packed. Very long line, but moved relatively fast and the food came out almost immediately after I ordered it. Decent oat latte. The empanadas were incredible!! I recommend spinach and breakfast empanada, which I got!! Boyfriend got the very popular breakfast burrito, said it was pretty good. I really like this place, but felt that it was cramped. We sat outside which was nice but it was a little chilly. I would come back just for the empanadas!!
Great coffee
One of my favorite places in Charlotte. Excellent food and relaxed environment. Definitely my go to place on my free time
Very good Americano. Rich, strong, and flavorful. Mucho better than Starbucks.

I love Giddy Goat! It is the best coffee shop, hands down in Charlotte NC. They have the best coffee and they are conscious of making a positive impact on the environment. They truly are leading the way in how coffee shops are ran. They compost and welcome you to bring your own cup. All while using reusable cups for in house purchases. They also compost working with Queen City compost. They have amazing food, especially the empanadas! I had their vegan empanadas today and they were delicious, filling, and mouthwatering. They also have vegan cinnamon bread and vegan lemon power balls! For non vegans there is also so many lovely, delicious items to choose from. My favorite before going vegan are their croissants. The chocolate croissants are a must try! They also offer space to rent for parties, gatherings, and buisness.

I remember when this place opened and I am so happy to see Giddy Goat thriving. Please visit this coffee shop and bring your own cup if you have one!

I used to work here and it was awful. They told us they would pay us $12.00 an hour, but only paid us $7.25. The managers put way too much work on their employees without doing much work themselves. They didn't listen to a word their employees said, even after specifically asking for feedback, especially their female employees. And the kitchen manager didn't wash his hands after touching raw chicken.
I'm sure it's probably the best coffee in Charlotte!!
Hands down the only place to get coffee and a bite to eat while enjoying an amazing atmosphere. Fun place for every age
A great neighborhood gathering place. We've been coming here since it's opening, and look forward to our next visit.
Exactly what I needed in a local neighbourhood coffee shop! Highly recommend it for patisseries made in house and lovely coffee selections
Good coffee and good atmosphere. If you need to work, this would be a good spot. Plenty of tables and solid WiFi.

We were quite impressed with The Giddy Goat Coffee Roasters in Charlotte. We visited on an early Saturday morning to get some coffee and morning grub. It wasn't too busy.

We got the cappuccino, the flat white and empanadas. The coffees made the perfect start to our day, and the empanadas were quite delicious. The service was 10/10-the perfect blend of polite and prompt. It was interesting to read the story behind their interesting name as well.

They also serve burritos and alcohol including beer and wine.

There's a small-ish parking lot outside. I highly recommend it to get some good coffee in Charlotte and will be back here soon.
Food was great, especially the empanadas! Coffee was ok.
I just moved to charlotte and this place is undoubtedly my favorite spot. It's cozy, the coffee is great, the people are super nice, and it's my favorite way to spend a Sunday morning!
Great place to work with quality coffee - love the upstairs space!

This is straight up one of the best lavender lattes I've had in a long time. Also, my gosh! The sweet corn empanada was a-ma-zing. And take the recommendation of the staff. The dulce croissant. Chef's kiss 
This was a full house on a Monday late morning and I can see why. Lots of outdoor seating which was delightful on a fall day. Would definitely come back. With friends. Awesome!

A really good cafe. Great atmosphere with a good amount of indoor and outdoor seating, beer on tap and wine by the glass, a good amount of healthy slices, muffins and pastries to match with good coffee. Free WiFi.
My favorite coffee spot in Charlotte. I wish it was closer to where I live but I enjoy it each time I come.
Great location. The coffee options are endless with great customer service.
by far my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte with the BEST energy, such an inspiring spot to get work done, connect, or just enjoy existing
Love love love the atmosphere! Good tasting coffee and lovely empanadas. And close to home too!

I like to find local coffee shops when I'm traveling. The good: The coffee is delicious and the service was quick and friendly. The negative: To go coffee. I ordered a large black coffee but it appears there is only one size. I was given a cup filled to the top (appreciated at the time) without a sleeve. My fingers were on fire carrying the cup to the stand with lids and sleeves. Once in the car and moving, the lid was not fitting properly and that full cup was spilling all over my hand and interior.
I would suggest drinking on site.
Nice and colorful place but very busy and somewhat crowded when raining. Good tea though!
Great empanadas and coffee. Always quick and friendly service with lots of seating.

One empanada for this Venezuelan-descendant (MY grandmother brought over the best!) and I decided to order several more to take home for lunch during the week. I can't say I'm in the neighborhood frequently enough to try more (twice now), but I'll be back.
The atmosphere was great. Staff was welcoming and food was excellent.

Excellent coffee, my favorite barista (Gabe), delicious food options, and a coffee place that truly composts and cares for the environment. Come for the caffeine and empanadas and enjoy outside in the lovely Plaza Midwood area.

I visited on a busy Saturday morning and there was a line at least 10 people deep. However, they took orders quickly and they were very nice. The breakfast burrito I ordered was sooo good and the coffee was also awesome. Definitely will come back! Maybe on a weekday and work up in their lounge.
Bad coffee.
A little bit of everything.... Great for that afternoon pick-me-up. Nice atmosphere,
Our fav coffee and quick breakfast place in Plaza Midwood. Plus, our pup gets sooo much love here when we're by the sidewalk, pretty sure it's his fav place too.
Great coffee but really like how they minimize plastic and waste.

Coffee never disappoints and the 1 time I had the empanada it was good. Actually a lot better than most mediocre food in general I've had around the area. The baristas never seem super friendly, but are welcoming enough I think (only been a handful of times, all in late afternoon)
Delicious empanadas!

I have visited 2x, I will say great coffees and great spot...

However the two gentleman are very snooty. Reluctant to acknowledge "certain" people, Rolling of eyes when asked to correct order, dirty looks again to "certain" people... I love everything about the place but these two guys... Smh... I'm not coming back to spend my money so I can be treated like I'm an inconvenience and not good enough for their standards. Too bad, great coffee.

Such a cute spot to have delicious coffee. I ordered a cappuccino as well as a chocolate chip muffin and it was all so good. There a plenty of indoor and outdoor seating. The place is so welcoming and chill.
Good coffee. Great spaces inside and outside...both upstairs and at street level. Love it on cool days when they roll up the walls to open up the inside to the street. Very .

Went in with a friend and loved the environment. Quick service and clear communication! If you sit outside, you might meet a few very social cicadas. It made my first experience hanging out with a friend in Charlotte very pleasant. According to my friend, this is her go-to place for getting coffee and working too!
Great coffee and friendly location. Definitely worth checking out if you are visiting the area!
Tasty chicken empanada!
Really nice atmosphere, coffees good as well. Nothing over the top thought.
Local place with good coffee grounds and a good selection of drinks and food at a great location.
The staff was so kind and I LOVED their coffee and lemon loaf! Will definitely be returning at least once a week.
Coffee and foods are so good! Come every weekend's morning!

I don't know why I kept receiving my drinks in Togo containers when I kept repeating "for here". My friend got hers in regular glasses? I felt like they were telling me to leave. But the empanadas were very good and the outdoor seating was enjoyable. This one just left me scratching my head...

This is perhaps the best coffeeshop in all of Charlotte. Enzo the roaster is very passionate and skilled at his craft.  They roast to a perfect consistency and the coffee is never too bitter, sour and has nice balance of roast, earth notes and brightness.  As well, the coffeeshop has a real cozy and homey feel being in an older building in the heart of Plaza Midwood with beautiful towering oaks around it.  The upstairs bar and sitting area also is spectacular.   I have yet to try the food, but the Empanadas are home made and the cook is from Argentina.  They smell so good and I plan on trying them soon.   If you are fortunate to see when Enzo does the roasting, the coffee roaster is located in the open in the shop and you can watch him mix and roast beans which is a cool sight to see!
Super busy but it's worth the wait for the empanadas and coffee
Relaxing Cafe with good coffee and quick bites ready to pick up with little waiting.
Amazing coffee, perfect atmosphere, lovely outdoor seating, and perfect location. A must see if you are in the Plaza Midwood area!
Great coffee shop.
The spinach empanadas are to dieeee for

Consistently enjoyable. GG's my new go-to for coffee. Had baked goods previously, this time IPA and wrap.
Your associates are exceptional - represents your brand well. The atmosphere is welcoming and makes us want to return.
Thank you for moving to the neighborhood!

Great coffee and breakfast empanadas. The service is always quick and the employees are attentive, so it's worth the long line on the weekends. This coffee shop is exactly what Plaza needs - easy to find a quiet spot but also perfect for a quick coffee catch-up with a friend.
I love the empanadas and coffee. The service and atmosphere is always top notch!
Love this place! Best food and coffee in clt

The place has great vibes. Nice place to hangout and have coffee. Their breakfast empanadas are awesome. Love their blueberry muffin.
If you can walk, you will have a great time. Finding a parking is a nightmare.
Very nice coffee shop.  What you would hope to experience in a coffee shop -- good coffee and comfortable places to sit.

The staff here is always so friendly whether it is days like today when I walked in at a slow time or days like this past Sunday when it was swamped and they were experiencing technical issues with the payment kiosks.  That says a lot and keeps me coming back!  Also I love the atmosphere here and how the place feels like it is built into the trees!  Oh, and the coffee is great too!
Amazing vibes! Just didn't know where to pick up app to go orders :)

Excellent food and drinks (I am not a coffee drinker but I do enjoy their tea selection and hot chocolate). Happy and helpful service team. Atmosphere is clean and organized with wide variety inside and out, upstairs and down.
Great customer service

We did a takeout order here of six empanadas. I was definitely not disappointed, but in fact, impressed.

This was my first time here my friend introduced me to giddy goat and I didn't understand the idea of empanadas and coffee as a combo, but my thoughts have changed. It is the best combo that you could ask for.

The Caprese empanadas were the best.

Make sure you come early in the morning to pick up empanadas, because they make them on a daily basis and there's only a limited supply. Basically they sell until they sell out.
My absolute favorite spot to go in my neighborhood.  The people are awesome, great vibe and energy, and last but not least the FOOD and COFFEE are TOP TIER :)
The Hazelnut latte was filled with true coffee flavors  Surrounded area of this location is connected to a satisfying vibe

They got delicious empanadas. I had the Mediterranean and Patagonia. Iced coffee was good but needed some sweetness. They got a small parking so be prepare to find parking nearby to walk there which is pretty busy on weekends.

Great atmosphere and their iced chai lattes are good, but the blueberry muffin was much too sweet and cakey, the mocha cold brew cake was disappointing --texture all wrong, not good flavor, too thick of "frosting" or whatever it was, and my husband's iced hazelnut latte had too much syrup that just wouldn't mix in so it sat at the bottom and made it way too sweet.
Giddy Goat is like home. The staff are incredible humans, the service is spot on and the coffee is perfect every time.

literally the best coffee in all of charlotte. and I've tried a lot 

iced vanilla oat milk latte slaps
We love coming to the Giddy Goat. They're always so friendly, quick and helpful. Their coffee is great and the lattes come with two shots (always a plus!).
Giddy goat has the best staff in town.  Always friendly and personable

My companion and had lattes and the banana bread.

My cafe latte was creamy and delicious with whole milk. My companion's matcha latte was great as well.

Clean, nicely decorated and good ambiance.

They have an upstairs outdoor deck, and an upstairs lounge. Lots of seating and good clientele.

Nice little walkable neighborhood.

I recommend it and I'd go back.

Giddy Goat has and will remain one of my favorite places to go. The coffee is in my opinion the best quality I have found in town and consistently so. The service is also always kind and friendly. The empanadas are so delicious and go perfectly with your coffee.
amazing coffee and atmosphere!! highly recommend

Immediately could tell this place was going to be a high quality place. Only ordered an ice coffee but it was SO good. Want to go back and not only get another but want to try some other things.

The flavor was honestly such a good sign. Be back soon!

The nitro tea is hands down my fave drink there. Their empanadas are also very tasty, and I love the variety. Literally can't go wrong with anything you order. Service is excellent and seating is varied, both inside and outside.

Decent enough coffee.
Staff is hit or miss with their attitude.
Stopped in for coffee and empanadas early on a Saturday and everyone there was so friendly and helpful! The flat white was perfect and so were the breakfast empanadas! Will definitely be back!
The coffee was delicious, the staff was kind and helpful, and the empanadas.... I will be back to try every flavor.
My favorite chai latte. They have the best quality coffee!!
I love giddy goat! Great coffee and friendly staff :)
The staff is always so friendly which makes the experience 10x better. Great coffee and atmosphere - and the empanadas always pair so well.

Giddy Goat has been one of our absolute favorite coffee shops to walk to in the morning, grab a cup of coffee and get some work done. If you're looking for a delicious coffee and a place to meet friends or get work done this is the place for you.
Gotta love the vegan options.
Quickest order ahead breakfast and coffee. Get the breakfast burrito on the weekend!

Very pleasant experience with Goody Goat. The atmosphere is nice, including an upstairs seating area and outdoor/rooftop patios. Depending on when you go, parking can be tricky. This is a place you walk up to the counter, order, pay, wait for name call, and then go find a seat to enjoy.
Great coffee and wonderful staff
Great coffee. Delicious food. Nice ambiance.
Always a great environment

five stars across the board. cute for-here glasses, sweet staff, really cool and modern-looking building with tons of seating. can't really recommend this place more. I think it's my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte, and there are a lot of coffee shops!

I love this place - great coffee, friendly & talkative employees, and fantastic vibe for getting out of the house and still being able to get work done (ie comfy seating inside and house and strong internet connection).
Great coffee and ambiance. Friendly service always makes us feel welcome.
First time stopping by this morning.  Thanks Sarah and the rest of the staff.  Great coffee, service and food.
A must every time I visit Charlotte

I cannot recommend this place enough. This is my favorite coffee shop in CLT. Best affordable food, awesome staff, and great atmosphere. I love the upstairs workspace!

Their chai is amazing and you can't leave without an empanada or a burrito! A must try!
Great local coffee shop with breakfast items. The staff were friendly and there were multiple seating options on the first and second floors as well as outside.
Love it.

Very good breakfast empanadas, and coffee. It's also dog-friendly! I ordered an iced lavender latte, and two breakfast empanadas. Love the design of the building as well, you can even participate in morning goat yoga upstairs!
Great iced chai lattes. And their bakery is the best.

Excelente lugar y el mejor en todo Charlotte , NC  para tomar un buen cafe de calidad , como los de nuestros paises , con unas deliciosas empanadas Argentinas  , el dueno de este negocio es muy amistoso y muy sencillo . 100% recomendado es un lugar muy tranquilo me gusta ir casi todos los dias
I had a mocha and their Goat burrito. 11/10 would go again.
Giddy Goat coffee and lattes are always on point!
Friday posted hours are incorrect. Went here after dinner, was already closed by 8.

This place is the real deal. Excellent baristas who take care to pull the perfect shot. Very cool interior vibe. If looking for a spot to do some work or be creative, this is a great place. Unpretentious which was refreshing.

First time here today, I ordered Hot Vanilla Latte and I think it was above average. The chicken empanada is salty. I would give it 5 stars if the empanada wasn't salty. I do love the vibe and the coffee so I would comeback again and try other items on the menu.
The staff are always friendly and helpful

I expected better service and food based on the reviews. The hot latte was was warm at best. The lemon pound cake was served cold, no mention of heating. It was hard as a rock and dry even after asking for it to be heated up. There are too many great coffee options in the area to go back.
Great place for coffee specialty drinks!

Very cool, neighborhood coffee shop. Lots of seating options outside in yard, outside at picnic table, inside with work tables, upstairs small tables, sofa....but its SMALL ANDNALWAYS CROWDED. 2  bathroom downstairs. (There might be upstairs bathroom). Prices average for Plaza Midwood $3.00 coffee. And there was HONEY for tea. Very nice to sit w/friend, to work or solo...IF YOU FIND A SPOT. Enjoy.peace

Great breakfast burrito and the empanada selection was fantastic. We got one of each and they were all unique and delicious in their own way. Coffee was coffee and pretty well priced. I can't stress enough how good the burrito is. Super simple, fresh, and seasoned. I will be a regular for sure & will be adding it to the weekend breakfast rotation now that I live in the area.

Upstairs room is a bit less bustling with sectional couch space, high tops and low tops with a bar with ample seating and a large window. Very friendly and enthusiastic staff making up goodies. The coffee was beautiful and tasty. I did not have the empanadas or burritos. Wish I had! The muffin was pretty lackluster and the loaf was beyond bad! . Would have loved a bacon egg and cheese bagel or even kolaches to be on their menu! They were doing a bit of construction upstairs, but there is still ample seating! The downstairs was packed on a weekday, which is a compliment not a complaint! Definitely a nice spot with exceptional coffees and GREAT staff!!!!
Perfect cup of coffee!
Great lattes and good atmosphere!
thought it was pretty good. tried the dirty chai, nothing wow but still very tasty. would try one of their empanadas next time
The best coffee i've ever had
Recommended by the server at Midwood BBQ. This place has great coffee and pastries.

I was able to try many local roaster at a recent event for coffee.  Out of all the brands I tried, this was 1 of the top 2.  They gave away free empanadas at the event, turns out they make and sell wonderful onces.  Ate a breakfast empanada and a cappuccino and bought 3 bags of the deliciously fresh roaster coffee for later.
